articles.title: Harry Styles jokes he 'just popped over to Venice to spit on Chris Pine' ... during concert in NYC - Daily Mail
articles.description: Fans spotted Styles seemingly spitting at Chris Pine as he took a seat next to him at the Venice Film Festival Sunday at the premiere of Don't Worry Darling.
articles.content:
Harry Styles played up the controversy surrounding his recent run-in with Chris Pine on Wednesday as he performed his Love On Tour: Madison Square Garden Is Harrys House gig.
